definitions.definition: ( colloquial ) A friend , buddy , mate , cobber ; someone to hang around with.
examples: Little Timmy's out playing with his pals .

definitions.definition: ( colloquial ) An informal term of address, often used ironically in a hostile way.
examples: Don't you threaten me, pal – I'll report you to the police.

main_definition: ( colloquial ) A friend , buddy , mate , cobber ; someone to hang around with.
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) An informal term of address, often used ironically in a hostile way.

definitions.definition: Alternative form of paul ( “ kind of tent ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative form of paul ( “ kind of tent ” ) .
